message:
SYSTEM: NicolasMayo2018.pdf: Página 9
Semantic interoperability with the SWoT
Describing devices and data
▶IoT ontologies provide vocabularies for both devices (e.g.
SOSA) and data (e.g. QUDT)
▶The WoT can be used to enable IoT Linked Data
Reasoning for the IoT
▶Enabling devices and data sources discovery
▶Making deductions to capture higher level symptoms
speaker: SYSTEM
